overview: When you have a normal sized lady over and you have a cramped apartment there's hardly any room for fucking. As she's banging you, you're banging your head against the wall because there's nowhere else to go. That's why petite girls are so great! There's plenty of room for both of you to fuck! Afterwards, you can watch ATK Petites 13 and learn a whole new set of positions for your little woman to try.
title: ATK Petites 13
